external_games.name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate - Victorian Legends Pack
Assassin's Creed Syndicate - Victorian Legends pack

name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Victorian Legends Pack
summary: The Victorian Legends pack pays tribute to some of the most famous novels of the Victorian era. Underwater adventures, vampires and man-made monsters come to life as state-of-the-art weapons and gear that's sure to give Jacob & Evie a stylish edge over the Templars. This Animus trickery contains an outfit for Evie, three weapons and two pieces of gear. Players need to be level 7 and above to equip these.
